board_desc: "An ultra-premium 8×8 chessboard perfectly centered in frame, shown in strict orthographic top-down view so every square is fully visible, unobstructed, and game-accurate. The board itself takes up most of the image, with a thin margin around it. The light squares are luminous Arc Reactor glass panels with subtle blue circuitry glowing beneath the surface; the dark squares are cracked voidstone obsidian infused with faint purple cosmic veins. Each square is perfectly aligned, crisp, and easy to read for gameplay.Outside the edges of the board, in the background only (never overlapping or covering any squares), the environment expands into a cinematic battlefield: behind the white home rank rises a sleek, MCU-inspired Avengers-style tower on a New York City skyline, lit with cool blue and white lights; behind the black home rank, far in the distance, sits a massive, ominous cosmic throne on a shattered asteroid plateau floating in deep space, surrounded by swirling nebulae and scattered debris. Along the far left and right edges of the frame, you can see hints of New York skyscrapers and city lights blending into the cosmic sky, but they always stay outside the main board area.Lighting is dramatic but functional: soft rim-lighting around the board edges, gentle reflections on the Arc Reactor glass squares, and a subtle cosmic glow from above. Resolution is ultra-sharp, 8k, photorealistic, with a faint aura of Infinity-Stone-style energy pulsing along the grid lines — but the 8×8 board remains perfectly clean, flat, readable, and never obstructed by any background elements."
piece_desc: "Each piece can use their own unique standard typical colour pallette the white pieces don't have to be white and the black pieces dont have to be black. For example use black widows black leather with red sting effect on wrists. Always display the full body of the piece from head to toe centered and only 1 character model asset not the left and right views.. Each chess piece is a hyper-detailed sculpture, crafted with the precision and dramatic style of a premium Todd McFarlane action figure. Every character stands on a simple, clean, circular museum-style display base — matte black for white-side heroes, polished silver for black-side villains. The base is the ONLY part that resembles a chess piece: no crowns, no knight heads, no traditional silhouettes. Every figure is posed heroically in a dynamic, story-driven stance that reflects their personality and combat style. Rendering Style: Premium studio collectible photography. Ultra-sharp, micro-detail sculpting. High-end materials. Dramatic rim lighting. Soft volumetric bounce. Slight depth-of-field blur. No reflections or highlights that obscure the character’s face or armor. White pieces must always be photographed on a dark/black background. Black pieces must always be photographed on a light/white background. WHITE SIDE — THE AVENGERS KING — Captain America A heroic, battle-weathered statue of a super-soldier standing proud with shield raised. Armor shows fine texture, scratches, dirt, and metallic edge wear. Leather straps, fabric seams, and shield dents are sculpted with absurd precision. Blue ambient glow highlights the shield’s outer ring. QUEEN — Black Widow - A dynamic mid-combat pose with dual electrified batons. Tactical suit rendered with premium figure detail: micro-stitching, reinforced plating, flexible tactical material. Hair sculpted in wind-swept motion. Electric effects subtly glowing on the base. BISHOP — Iron Man (Armored Variant) - Hovering slightly above the base with repulsors blazing. Armor plates hyper-polished with micro-engravings, mechanical joints, pivot points, and layered plating visible. Blue-white repulsor lighting reflects subtly across the metallic body. KNIGHT — Thor - Powerful stance with enchanted hammer/axe hybrid resting on shoulder. Storm-like lightning veins glow faintly through skin and armor. Cape flows in sculpted mid-motion. Base crackles with faint lightning arcs. ROOK — Hulk - Massive, heavy statue with hyper-defined musculature. Skin texture includes pores, scars, veins, and subtle gamma radiance. Jaw clenched, roaring. Cracked stone debris sculpted on base to emphasize power. PAWN — Hawkeye - Lean, precise archer stance. Bow drawn with a glowing tech-arrow nocked. Tactical armor finely detailed with pockets, straps, and layered Kevlar textures. Minimal, clean composition for easy repeatability across pawns. BLACK SIDE — THE VILLAINS -KING — Red Skull - A sinister, commanding figure in a dark uniform with arcane sigils etched into the sculpt. The skull is perfectly carved — smooth bone texture, etched cracks, deep-set glowing eyes. One hand raised with a red mystic energy effect sculpted in translucent plastic. QUEEN — Ultron - Tall, menacing mechanical form with razor-sharp angles. Metallic plating layered with micro-vents, servos, and internal glowing red wiring. Eyes burn with intensity. Subtle mechanical tendrils emerging from behind. BISHOP — Thanos (Gauntlet Variant) - Towering, armored titan standing on a cracked cosmic stone base. Gauntlet fully detailed with multifaceted Infinity Stones glowing in different colors. Armor deeply engraved, musculature heavy and stone-like. Cosmic energy sculpt swirling around one arm. KNIGHT — Loki - Regal trickster pose with long horned helmet. Staff tipped with glowing gem. Clothing intricately sculpted with layered leather, gold trim, and textured armor plates. Cape flows in elegant motion. ROOK — Abomination - Brutal, jagged green textured abomination creature statue. Rock-hard skin with bone spikes breaking through. Deep muscle striations,
